name: UnofficialPortal2LemonRant
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lemon rant
des:
The skill makes Alexa repeat Cave Johnson's lemon rant from, "Portal 2"

Disclaimer: This skill is not associated with Valve or Portal in anyway. It is a fan-made tribute to the game. I'm not responsible for any fear of Alexa damaging anything (with combustible lemons). Alexa, won't really burn your house down.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
